attributes.action: New House of Commons Speaker - Jerremy Paxman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time to clean up the mess about the House after the party

We need a new strong House of Commons speaker - I suggest Jerremy Paxman - They wouldn't dare cross him!

Paxman V Howard 2004

"Did you threaten to overrule him?" (referring to Lewis head of the Prison service) – a total of 12 times in succession" 

Regards C.ab - Milton Keynes

rejection.details: Members of Parliament vote to decide who becomes the Speaker. He/she is not appointed by Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
